name: Cree, Inc.
description: Cree, Inc. is a global leader in LED lighting and semiconductor technology, known for its commitment to innovation and sustainability. Founded in 1987, Cree has revolutionized the LED market with its high-performance lighting solutions and has a strong focus on reducing energy consumption and environmental impact. The company designs and manufactures a wide range of LED products, including light bulbs, fixtures, and smart lighting solutions that cater to both commercial and residential markets. Cree is also a key player in the development of silicon carbide (SiC) and gallium nitride (GaN) technologies, which enable the creation of more efficient power and radio frequency devices. With a mission to advance the world’s transition to sustainable energy, Cree is dedicated to developing technologies that improve energy efficiency and reduce carbon footprints. The company’s innovative approach has led to numerous patents and industry awards, establishing it as a trusted name in lighting and semiconductor solutions. Cree's vision extends beyond lighting, as it continuously explores new applications for its advanced materials and technologies, contributing to a sustainable future.
